text: Pas, kase, ki [ʙardaero] najoʙad, pes az omezisi cinsi du moh pajopaj ruza ʙigirad va kase, ki nametavonad [ruza ʙigirad, dar on surat] ʙojad sast miskinro taom dihad. In [kaffora] ʙaroi on ast, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va rasulas imon ʙijovared va inho hududi [ahkomi] ilohi ast va ʙaroi kofiron azoʙi dardnoke [dar pes] ast
